attributes.action: Introduce Drugs of Abuse testing for sitting members of parliament.
attributes.background: Workplace drug testing exists in many sectors, military, transport, clinical, but not in government. The public deserves to have representatives who are sober and not impeded by drugs of abuse. A recent study showed that all but 1 bathroom in the Houses of Parliament contained traces of cocaine.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory drug tests for all MPs, Lords & their staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602604

Mandatory drug testing for everyone working on the parliamentary estate: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609273
